page.title: 04Local Yearly Events
page.content: In our area we have lots of yearly events that local people go to.These are some of them.We have {jumble } sales in the new village hall and if someone wealthy moves out of their house they sometimes give some of their things to the jumble sales and it makes a really good sale. In the summer at {Ulcombe School they have a{summer fair}and sports day in one.On the play ground they have the fair and on the field they have the sports and pony rides.The school opens the adventure playground for children to play in.Also in the summer at{Stonehall farm}they hold Ulcombe dog show.In the dog show there are about twenty classes and these are some of them.The dog with the waggiest tail,best mongrel,best pedigree, best condition,best child handler.
